These are line commands to build up the database using the class ''thermo.build.BuildDatabase'':

 * [JThergasLineCommandsDatabaseSubstructureThermo SubstructureThermo] Thermodynamic corrections for cycles and steric hindrances.
 * [JThergasLineCommandsDatabaseSubstructures Substructures] Put substructures in the database
 * [JThergasLineCommandsDatabaseSymmetryDefinitions Symmetry Definitions] Defining symmetry definitions.
 * [JThergasLineCommandsDatabaseBuildBenson Build Benson Tables] Build the individual Benson rules.


[JThergasLineCommands back]
